entries.details: Panobinostat exposure on organoids: 20 nM, 72h cycles with media refresh; selected as top GOF from DSA.
entries.results: ~80–90% viability reduction by day 7; compact spheroid morphology and reduced proliferation markers.

entries.details: Temozolomide exposure on organoids: 100 μM, 48h on/24h off cycles; top GOF from DSA.
entries.results: ~60–75% viability reduction; increased apoptosis markers; growth delay versus untreated.

entries.details: Paclitaxel 10 mg/kg IV weekly ×3 starting at implantation; second-highest efficacy by GOF.
entries.results: Invasive growth retained; survival extended to 35–50 days (vs 30–45 untreated).

entries.details: Panobinostat 10 mg/kg IP qod ×14 days with matrix encapsulation; top drug by GOF.
entries.results: Encapsulated tumor growth with limited infiltration; survival 60–90 days.

entries.details: Selumetinib 25 mg/kg PO bid ×21 days; second-best efficacy by GOF (tie-broken by GOF+DSSS).
entries.results: Invasive growth maintained; survival improved to 55–75 days (vs 50–70 untreated).

entries.details: Temozolomide 50 mg/kg PO daily 5/7 ×2 cycles; top drug by GOF.
entries.results: Encapsulated tumors with minimal invasion; survival 100–140 days.
